org.osmdroid.util

Class Distance

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.osmdroid.util.Distance

  • public class Distance
extends Object
    Tools about 2D distance computation Optimized code: we compute the square of the distance. If you really want to know the distance, apply Math.sqrt
    Since:
    6.0.0

      • getProjectionFactorToLine

        public static double getProjectionFactorToLine(double pFromX,
                                               double pFromY,
                                               double pAX,
                                               double pAY,
                                               double pBX,
                                               double pBY)
        Returns:
        0 if projected to A, 1 if projected to B, [0,1] if projected inside segment [A,B], < 0 or > 1 if projected outside of the segment
        Since:
        6.0.3 Projection factor on line AB from a point

      • getProjectionFactorToSegment

        public static double getProjectionFactorToSegment(double pFromX,
                                                  double pFromY,
                                                  double pAX,
                                                  double pAY,
                                                  double pBX,
                                                  double pBY)
        Returns:
        [0,1]; 0 if projected to A, 1 if projected to B
        Since:
        6.0.3 Projection factor on segment AB from a point
